InfoPage.paragraph1: Hello! I'm a frontend developer specializing in React and Next.js. I've worked on various projects from marketing solutions to 3D web games at startups. I can handle the entire process from design to deployment and focus on building user-friendly web services. I enjoy learning new technologies and trends quickly and applying them to real projects. I believe in growing together with my teammates and strive to create valuable results, ultimately maximizing business impact.

AstarmizePage.title: Astarmize
AstarmizePage.subtitle: B2B Marketing Content Automation AI Service Client Development
AstarmizePage.projectOverviewText: Developed the client for a B2B marketing content automation AI service. This service simplifies and automates the marketing content creation process through a user-friendly interface and various features, including a WYSIWYG editor, Instagram post auto-distribution system, and multi-layer image editing functionality.
AstarmizePage.achievement1: Improved user content creation efficiency by developing a ProseMirror-based WYSIWYG editor and custom plugins
AstarmizePage.achievement2: Implemented an Instagram post auto-distribution system using Meta Graph API, reducing content upload time by 70%
AstarmizePage.achievement3: Created multi-layer image editing functionality using Canvas API, eliminating dependence on external graphic tools and streamlining workflow, resulting in a 40% reduction in user work time
AstarmizePage.achievement4: Built a multilingual support system (Korean, English, French) using i18next
AstarmizePage.achievement5: Optimized and automated CI/CD pipeline using Github Actions, reducing deployment time from 15 minutes to 3 minutes (80%) and improving development productivity
